sourcesContent:
<template>
    <section class="users__wrapper">
        <user-item/>
        <user-item/>
        <user-item/>
        <user-item/>
        <user-item/>
    </section>
</template>
<script>
import UserItem from '@/components/UserItem'
import {mapState, mapMutations, mapActions} from 'vuex'
export default {
    name: 'user-slider',
    components: {
        UserItem,
    },
    methods: {
        ...mapMutations({
            addUsers: 'TestModule/addUsers'
        }),
        ...mapActions ({
            fetchUsers: 'TestModule/fetchUsers'
        }),

    },
    computed:{
        ...mapState({
            users: state => state.TestModule.users,
        }),
    },
    mounted() {
        this.fetchUsers();
    },
}
</script>
<style lang="sass" scoped>
.users__wrapper
   display: flex
   flex-direction: row
   gap: 10px
</style>
